name: Ambrosia
Relationship: Compare in hay-fever: Sabadilla, Wyethia; Succ-ac.; Ars. jod.;' Arundo.

Nose: Stuffed up feeling of nose and head
Irritation of trachea and bronchial tubes, with asthmatic attacks

details: A remedy for hay-fever, LACHRYMATION and INTOLERABLE ITCHING EYE-LIDS. Some forms of whooping-cough. Respiratory tract in its entire length stopped up. MANY FORMS OF DIARRHEA, especially during summer months, also dysentery.
dosage: Tincture, to third potency; 10 drops in water during and after attack of epistaxis. In hay-fever high potencies.
